title: Lightning Bolt Dingbat(s)?
content: Hi all. I'm looking for a dingbat face that's got a good lightning bolt (or bolts). Preferably something hand drawn or sketchy, like something you'd draw on your Pee Chee folder with a marker. Any ideas?
author: Spencer Cross

comments.content: If you want something hand-drawn/sketchy, why don't you draw it yourself?

Thanks, both, but given the way I'm going to use it (and mores specifically, the way my client is going to use it) I specifically need a font. If I have to I can make it, but obviously it's easier to use something that already exists.

--  
**Spencer Cross**  
» [http://tokyofarm.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091722/http:/tokyofarm.com/)  
» [http://kernspiracy.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091722/http:/kernspiracy.com/)

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/elemeno/zap-bats/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100120091722/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/elemeno/zap-bats/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/elemeno/zap-bats/")

Check out the character map of this font.

Sharon

Thanks very much for the pointers!

--  
**Spencer Cross**
